nodes.name: Manual Trigger
nodes.notes: Run this workflow ONCE manually to backfill historical data. Then disable or delete this workflow.

parameters.content:
## Backfill Historical Emails

This workflow imports your historical email data from Google Sheets into the dashboard.

### Instructions:
1. Run this workflow ONCE manually
2. Watch the execution to ensure it completes
3. Check your dashboard at http://localhost:3000
4. DISABLE or DELETE this workflow after running

### What it does:
- Reads all leads from your Google Sheet
- For each lead with sent emails, creates events
- Sends events to /api/events endpoint
- Includes: Email 1, 2, 3 sends, replies, opt-outs

### Notes:
- Timestamps are estimated (spread across past 30 days)
- LLM costs cannot be backfilled (no historical data)
- Rate limited to avoid overwhelming the API
